page.title: 18Vehicle Census
page.content: Of the permanently occupied houses in the study area all apart from 4 have vehicles.These vehicles are made up of 53 cars, 6 vans, 7 tractors, 2 caravanettes, 1 minibus and 3 lorries, a total of 72 vehicles.We analysed the number plates of the vehicles to determine the average age of vehicles in this area. Our graph appears below:- * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 72737475767778798081828384 From the graph the average age of the vehicles is 5 years old.
